	<item>
				<title>ARGUS - Your Fitness Tracker by Azumio</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1842</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 22:36:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1842</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong><a href="http://paltip.com/https:..quantimodo.com/!187ex">Argus</a> is a step, activity and nutrition tracker app.</strong>

Argus turns your iPhone into a sophisticated health and fitness device as it monitors and manages your activities, food, workouts, sleep, hydration, weight and vitals, helping you make sense of numerous bio-feedback data points to reach your health goals and improve overall well-being.

Argus is designed to harness every aspect of mobile computing to monitor your lifestyle without compromising your privacy. Argus is engineered for minimal power consumption and run 24/7 in the background. However continued use of GPS running in the background can significantly decrease battery life.

With an intuitive, eye-catching interface, Argus allows you to get a snapshot of your daily activity. Timeline is organized in a honeycomb structure that allow easy aggregation of your data and detailed views. You can tap once on a cell to get more information. You can tap and hold for 2 seconds to get the aggregated views of your inputs.

- Daily step counter and activity tracking
- Creates food diary of all your meals with food snapping
- Set daily goals for steps, sleep time and hydration
- Observe trends over time with all variables to track wellness
- Create close friends list to share food photos and other data
- Uses Instant Fitness for your home workouts
- Uses Sleep Time to monitor your sleep cycles
- Uses Instant Heart Rate to monitor your heart beats
- Built in support of third party wearable devices and health apps

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/e1/7c/3a/e17c3a54-acbd-477d-6a89-70651df59e97/screen568x568.jpeg" />

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple4/v4/61/a1/4f/61a14fc5-9845-5680-73dc-90842d6de1ad/screen568x568.jpeg" />]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Moodlytics</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1864</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 27 Sep 2013 16:41:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1864</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong> </strong>What is <a href="http://paltip.com/https:..quantimodo.com/!187fq"> moodlytics</a> helps you to log your moods, maintain a mood journal, track your moods through charts, calendars and graphs and perform a deep analysis for "Happiness"

&nbsp;

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/109/Purple/v4/2a/e4/04/2ae4040e-20dc-6545-6a97-c537e4bdb9d6/mzl.yuyviuny.320x480-75.jpg" />

	<item>
				<title>iRxHelper</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1915</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:26:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1915</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[By entering your prescription information into the application, the program will show you which prescriptions need to be refilled within a week (an adjustable value) via a badge on the application's logo. This is a highly useful feature to make sure you don't get stuck trying to refill prescriptions at the last minute.

<span style="font-size: 13px;">This program allows you to enter multiple family members, so you can not only keep track of your prescriptions, but you can keep track of your family's prescriptions as well as those of your PETS and ELDERLY PARENTS! Doctors can also utilize this application to keep track of patient medications.</span>

This application provides not only a convenient way to find out when prescriptions are due, but is a great place to get an OVERVIEW of all the medications you are taking - very useful to show your doctors/hospitals. Medication HISTORY also allows you to keep track of what you have taken and when you stopped taking that medication.

And remember that all of your prescription information stays on the device and only goes over the network if you choose to use the email option to email your data to a healthcare provider (or to yourself). The program also comes with passcode protection to protect your data.
-Badge on application that tells you how many prescriptions need to be refilled within 7 days (adjustable value)
-Push notifications to update your refill count without having to launch the application! (network connectivity required)
-Keeps track of multiple family members
-Share data securely between family members and doctors using Bump™
-Passcode protection to keep your data secure on your device
-Email your prescription data to your healthcare provider (or to yourself)
-Pill count estimates and automatic refill date calculations
-Integration with your contact book to allow you to easily contact your doctor/pharmacy
-Variety of sorting and display options for your prescriptions
-Maintains prescription history for a complete listing of past and present prescription information
-Fast customer support and response to feature requests and bug reports
-Available in French, German, Italian, Japanese, and Spanish

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/1e/0d/50/1e0d50a0-1b10-cdb1-db38-79bfb62ea815/screen568x568.jpeg" />

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/94/44/98/9444981c-1173-b203-5e8b-b98e2f3c74c9/screen568x568.jpeg" />]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Insight Timer - Meditation Timer</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1917</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:31:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1917</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[With beautiful Tibetan singing bowls and a dynamic worldwide meditation community, Insight Timer is the fun, modern way to support your meditation practice.

Imagine the sound of beautiful Tibetan singing bowls, gently and peacefully guiding you through your meditation session. Your attention focused inward with no need to worry about the clock…

Insight Timer gives you this and much more. It's simple enough to get started with just a few taps, yet powerful enough to handle the most sophisticated meditation routines with advanced features such as interval bells, presets and a meditation journal.

With Insight Connect, you can become part of a global meditation community - seeing at a glance people around the world who are meditating with you. Link your Facebook or Twitter account and you and your friends can follow and support one another's practice. It's also a great way to make new friends who share your love of meditation.

Recorded with the highest quality digital audio equipment, these bell samples are amazing. Crystal clear with extra long fade outs. They sound great with the built-in speaker, but to get the full effect, try using headphones or external speakers.

- Choose from eight different bells of varying size and metal compositions - from bright and clean to deep and complex with lovely overtones. A wood block sound is also included.

- Bells can be configured to ring at the start, the end, and at specified (or random) times during your session. Each bell can be set to ring once, twice or three times. The delay between strikes is configurable from 1 to 20 seconds.

- Powerful logging and statistics features allow you to track your progress over time. Multiple charts, a complete session log and helpful statistics give you a complete picture of how your practice is evolving.

- Presets allow you to save an unlimited number of configurations and assign names to them. If you have multiple meditation routines (such as Morning and Evening), this makes it easy to switch between them without any configuration changes.

- Insight Connect milestones are awarded for significant achievements as your practice progresses.

- You may set a background image from your own photo album. While the timer is running, your image is shown full screen. Optionally, the time display and controls can be hidden so that they are shown only when the image is tapped.

- Meditation Journal: You may enter notes about each session when the timer ends - a practice that many people find to be helpful and therapeutic. Your journal entries can be exported via an email attachment. Journal access may be password protected to ensure privacy.

- Insight Timer will run in the background. You can start the timer, then run other apps and the bells will continue to ring. When the timer is finished, a message will pop up to alert you.

- Insight Timer is geared toward meditation, but it also works great for yoga, Reiki, exercise or any other activity that you wish to time.

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple6/v4/93/f4/a1/93f4a1d5-5521-d8ec-bfbc-25b0aa4014c8/screen568x568.jpeg" />

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/insight-timer-meditation-timer/id337472899?mt=8&amp;uo=4&amp;at=10l59V]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Heart Rate Monitor by Log your Run</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1919</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:36:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1919</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[REVIEWS:

* "This app is really helpful for someone who wants to keep track of their heart rate"
* "Great and Accurate App!"
* "Works well!!"
* "I use this every day to get the pulse of patients"

FEATURES:

* Heart Rate / Pulse Measure *

Use this App to measure your heart rate by tapping your pulse or by counting your heart beats. Does not require any additional equipment - but you will have to find your pulse on your neck or your wrist.

* Heart Rate Zone Calculator *

Enter your max and resting heart rate and the app will calculate your heart rate zones. When you have your zones setup and you measure your heart rate - the app will show you which zone you are in.

* Heart rate from straps *

This application can get heart rate from a variety of different heart rate straps by using either the Wahoo Fitness, Runalyzer, or 60beat heart rate devices. This functionality requires the connectors which are sold separately.

In addition this app now has the ability to connect to bluetooth low energy heart rate straps on compatible devices. This functionality requires that you have an iPhone 4S or 3rd generation iPad. BTLE HR straps are sold by Wahoo fitness and Polar.<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/117/Purple/v4/89/49/27/894927fa-10bb-04e0-511d-fa4df261f49a/mzl.sntkebwv.320x480-75.jpg" /><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a3.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/112/Purple/v4/69/7e/17/697e1704-6e3a-d32e-77e5-0573ce05d38a/mzl.mvpaprho.320x480-75.jpg" />]]></content:encoded>

		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_key>page_options_titlebar_style</wp:meta_key>

		</wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
				<title>Positive Syncing</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1930</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:49:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1930</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<ul>
	<li>Listen to high quality recordings from a qualified clinical hypnotherapist</li>
	<li>Understand principles of positive thinking and synchronization</li>
	<li>Sync day-to-day thoughts with goals rather than negative beliefs</li>
	<li>Absorb confidence-building affirmation</li>
	<li>Choose between wake up or sleep ending</li>
	<li>
<div>
<div>
<div>
<div>Positive thoughts bring positive outcomes. But how do you create a positive attitude when things around appear to be so bad? In this recording, David Ridgeway sets out to explain the basic principles behind positive thinking and the law of attraction and how to synchronize your thoughts with your ambitions. It contains a simple but very effective relaxation technique which helps the listener to focus on what they want to achieve rather than what they want to eradicate from their lives. It also includes a power confidence-boosting affirmation to help bring about positive changes in attitude. Don't let past experiences and false, negative beliefs about yourself hold you back. Discover the power of Positive Syncing.<img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/71idhWeSxlL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/71frMajS-XL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61vYQLtm%2B5L.jpg" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61-gGNU5oML.png" /><a>http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!7q9o.</a></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<div></div>
&nbsp;

</div>
</div>
<div></div></li>
</ul>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>MIO Drive + Heart Rate Monitor Watch</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1931</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:52:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1931</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<ul>
	<li>EKG-accurate heart rate, without a chest strap</li>
	<li>Customizable with personal data to ensure accuracy</li>
	<li>Patented Diet Diary</li>
	<li>7 day metabolic expenditure</li>
	<li>Multi-function activity monitor uses accelerometer technology to accurately: count steps, estimate speed and distance traveled as well as calories burned</li>
	<li>Visual indicator of exertion level based on personal data</li>
	<li>Percent of maximum heart rate</li>
	<li>Visual indicator of heart rate recovery &amp; resting heart rate</li>
	<li>Upper and lower heart rate alerts</li>
	<li>7 day activity memory: displays 7 days of data</li>
	<li>Designed to utilize MIO’s 3500 Calorie Club Program<img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81v8KDW6b6L._SL1500_.jpg" />http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!7q9k</li>

	<item>
				<title>Garmin Forerunner 310XT GPS Heart Rate Monitor</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1933</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:54:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1933</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<ul>
	<li>Waterproof to a depth of 50 meters, so you can wear it in the pool or the lake to time your swim</li>
	<li>Tracks bike and run data and sends it wirelessly to your computer</li>
	<li>Track your position, distance, pace, heart rate (with bundled monitor), add accessories to measure power data and more</li>
	<li>20 hours of battery life</li>
	<li>One-year limited warranty
<table width="300" cellpadding="20" align="left">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="center"><small><b><i>A GPS-enabled training device that isn't afraid of the water.</i></b></small></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<table width="250" cellpadding="10" align="right">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="center"><a href="http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/B0025VKW5K-2.jpg"><img alt="" src="http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/B0025VKW5K-2-th.jpg" border="0" /></a><small><b><i>Track bike and run data and send it wirelessly to your computer.<a href="http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/B0025VKW5K-2.jpg">Click to enlarge.</a></i></b></small></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="center"><a href="http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/B0025VKW5K-3.jpg"><img alt="" src="http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/B0025VKW5K-3-th.jpg" border="0" /></a><small><b><i>Tracks distance, pace and heart rate. <a href="http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/B0025VKW5K-3.jpg">Click to enlarge.</a></i></b></small></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<b>Time Your Swim</b>
The swim-proof Forerunner 310XT is waterproof to a depth of 50 meters, so you can wear it in the pool or the lake to time your swim. And its slim design and flexible wristband mean Forerunner is easy to wear in any conditions.

<b>Transition Effortlessly</b>
When you're ready to jump out of the water and onto the bike, Forerunner 310XT moves easily from wrist to bike with the optional quick release and bike mounts, making the transition between sports effortless. Forerunner 310XT categorizes multisport activities in one workout and can also log transition time in the process, so you can analyze your performance from start to finish.

<b>Collect Workout Data</b>
Forerunner 310XT tracks your position precisely with GPS satellite data and records distance, pace, heart rate (optional), power data (from ANT+-enabled third-party power meters) and more. High-sensitivity GPS and HotFix satellite prediction mean Forerunner acquires satellites quickly and tracks your movement even near tall buildings or under tree cover. And using innovative ANT+ wireless technology, Forerunner 310XT connects seamlessly to an optional heart rate monitor, foot pod and cadence sensor.</li>
	<li>http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!7q9f</li>
</ul>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Garmin GSC 10 Speed/Cadence Bike Sensor</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1936</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:55:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1936</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<ul>
	<li>Cycling speed sensor for select Garmin wrist-mounted personal trainers and cycling computers</li>
	<li>Self-calibrating, wireless design measures both cycle speed and cadence in pedaling strokes per minute</li>
	<li>Provides up-to-the-minute feedback or captures results for later workout analysis</li>
	<li>Compatible with Garmin Edge 305, Edge 305CAD, and Forerunner 305</li>
	<li>Attaches easily to any bicycle; 1-year warranty<img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/715rATZVYcL._SL1500_.jpg" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/414gJR3PnzL.jpg" />http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!7q9e</li>
</ul>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Garmin Foot Pod [Retail Packaging]</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1937</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:56:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1937</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[This tiny foot pod is small enough to attach to your shoelaces or fit in the mid-sole pocket of compatible shoes. It's always ready to use, and a small, replaceable watch battery powers the foot pod for a year of training. Unlike simple pedometers, this foot pod uses advanced MEMS inertial-sensor technology to analyze your movements and is responsive to stride-length changes to achieve 98 percent accuracy for speed and distance. Additionally, this sensor measures running cadence to help you optimize your training

<img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91oql6dOnuL._SL1500_.jpg" />http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!7q9d]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Nike+ iPod Sport Kit</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1951</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 05:03:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1951</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1><a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!2mg8w" target="_blank">[gallery ids="2406,2407,2408"]

</a></h1>
&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;
<h2><a style="font-size: 1.5em;" href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!2mg8w" target="_blank">Nike+ iPod Sport Kit</a></h2>
The <em>Nike+</em>iPod Sport Kit consists of multiple devices working together to track physical activity: <em>Nike+</em> running shoes, <em>Nike+</em> iPod Sensor, and an iPod nano, iPod touch, or iPhone.

The <em>Nike+</em> sensors are placed into the bottom of the <em>Nike+</em> running shoe.  Data for steps is then transmitted to the to the iPod, without interfering with the user listening to music. The iPod records data for time, distance, pace, and calories burned.   Data can also  be synced to the nikeplus.com website where users are able to share their information with others.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[The Nike+iPod Sport Kit consists of multiple devices working together to track physical activity: Nike+ running shoes, Nike+ iPod Sensor, and an iPod nano, iPod touch, or iPhone.]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Jawbone UP Wristband</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1959</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 05:08:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1959</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1 dir="ltr"><a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!2mg7k" target="_blank"><img class="size-medium wp-image-2397 aligncenter" alt="jawboneup" src="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/jawboneup-300x133.jpg" width="300" height="133" /></a></h1>
<h2 dir="ltr"><a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!2mg7k" target="_blank">Jawbone UP Wristband</a></h2>
<p style="text-align: justify;">UP wristband and app allows users to track steps, distance, calories burned, and time spent active versus idle. It also allows users to track calories, fats, carbohydrates, protein, sugar, fiber, and sodium. UP delivers personalized insights and actionable tips to help  achieve goals. Users can set a <em>Smart Alarm</em> to silently wake them at the ideal moment in their sleep cycle. An <em>Idle Alerts</em> can also be set to remind users to move, if they have been sitting too long.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[UP wristband and app allows users to track steps, distance, calories burned, and time spent active versus idle. ]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>MoodiModo</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/moodimodo/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 03 Sep 2013 00:00:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1137</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[band variation="default" inset="yes"]
[row verticallyalign="yes"]

[/row]

[band variation="default" backgroundimage="http://www.euged.com/demo/metrolium/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/band_1.jpg" inset="yes"]

[row verticallyalign="yes"]
[column width="four-tenth"]
<img style="display: block; max-height: 500px; margin: 0 auto;" alt="MoodiModo on device" src="http://i.imgur.com/fjtvuFU.png" />
<a href="https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.quantimodo.mood">
<img style="display: block; max-height: 500px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" alt="MoodiModo Play Store link" src="http://developer.android.com/images/brand/en_generic_rgb_wo_60.png" />
</a>
[/column]
[column width="five-tenth"]
<p dir="ltr">Mental health is THE greatest unmet need of our time. About half of the people you know will develop a mental illness at some point during their lifetime. Over 50 million Americans currently suffer from some form of mental illness. MoodiModo is intended to help those who suffer from mood disorders such as <a href="http://www.nimh.nih.gov/health/topics/depression/index.shtml">major depressive disorder</a>, <a href="http://www.nimh.nih.gov/health/topics/depression/index.shtml">dysthymic disorder</a>, and <a href="http://www.nimh.nih.gov/health/topics/bipolar-disorder/index.shtml">bipolar disorder</a>.</p>
<p dir="ltr">You can’t manage what you don’t measure. Hence, it is crucial that mood be continually tracked and quantified in order to assess the effectiveness of various treatments. Those suffering from depression are characteristically non-compliant towards most avenues of treatment, including mood tracking.</p>
<p dir="ltr">MoodiModo makes tracking of one’s mood effortless by using a unique pop-up reminder interface that forces the user to rate their mood at regular intervals. When the user first installs the app, they get to set this reminder frequency and indicate their preferred means of notification, as well as reporting their first mood, engaging the user from the moment they start using MoodiModo.</p>
<p dir="ltr">In addition to the ability to track basic overall mood, MoodiModo also allows the user to submit a more detailed and precise measurement of their mood when time allows. This is done by answering questions related to the 20 different feelings and emotions defined by the Positive and Negative Affect Schedule (PANAS). The PANAS is a scale which was developed by Auke Tellegen in the Department of Psychology at the University of Minnesota and David Watson and Lee Anna Clark in the Department of Psychology at the University of Iowa to provide brief measures of positive and negative affect. The PANAS scales were originally published in the Journal of Personality and Social Psychology in 1988.</p>
<p dir="ltr">Users will have the ability to review their mood trends retrospectively, allowing them to identify triggers for symptoms and quantify the effectiveness of treatments. The social sharing features of MoodiModo would facilitate social support that is a critical element to recovery from these disorders. MoodiModo allows the user to easily share graphs of their mood on various social media websites such as Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Tumblr, and Pinterest. This will inform friends and family when someone is suffering.  Since emotional states are often invisible, visual depiction of emotion can ensure that no one ever needs to suffer alone in silence.</p>
<p dir="ltr">Physical and environmental factors influence how you feel, just as emotions often cause changes in your physical system. There are 100 billion neurons in the human brain, and each of them is busy most of the time constantly sending tiny electrical impulses from one brain cell to another.  This signalling is modulated by chemicals called neurotransmitters. This activity is the biochemical basis of feelings.</p>
<p dir="ltr">In turn, brain chemistry is influenced by a number of factors including degree of social interaction, sleep, diet, medication, and physical activity. Mood data from MoodiModo can also be automatically uploaded to the QuantiModo website.  At QuantiModo, this data can be combined with data from other applications, devices and electronic health records.  Since the human mind is not powerful enough to retain all of the necessary information, this data integration feature is essential to identifying correlations and causal relationships.</p>
<p dir="ltr">Users will also have the option to anonymously donate their data to the Mind First Foundation, the Personal Genome Project, and other researchers in order to help facilitate the crowdsourced observational research which will eventually lead to the eradication of mental illness.</p>
MoodiModo is currently available as a beta on Google Play. Join our <a href="https://plus.google.com/communities/100581500031158281444">community</a> to become a tester.
[/column]
[/row]

[gap height="30"]

[band variation="default" paddingtop="75px" paddingbottom="75px" inset="yes"]

[row verticallyalign="yes"]
[column width="three-fifth" offset="one-fifth"]
<h1 style="text-align: center;">Voice Your Mind</h1>
<p style="text-align: center;">We've built these apps specifically for you, and we'd love to hear back! Voice your mind on UserVoice and help us make Quantimodo an even happier place.</p>
[gap height="20"]
<p style="text-align: center;">[button link="http://quantimodo.uservoice.com/" target="_blank"]To our UserVoice![/button]</p>
[/column]
[/row]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>MedHelper Pro</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/medhelper/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 05 Sep 2013 17:29:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1150</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!zp2d">Med Helper Pro</a> keeps track of prescriptions, alarms remind you when medications need to be taken, notify you when Doctors appointments are scheduled and alert you when meds are running low or are about to expire.

Med Helper Pro also tracks your vital signs and PRN / take-as-needed medications. You can log and export reports to your Doctor, Nurse or Caregiver and multiple profiles let you manage others in your care.

<img alt="Med Helper Pro Pill Reminder - screenshot" src="https://lh5.ggpht.com/BztK7Ybca84PYT8mibbiYFwwAV5ZrlO6sAhGJe8ACtT155OH_dBjybUgMxIcS3ypSeo=h900-rw" width="383" height="630" />

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>Sleep as Android</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/sleep-as-android/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 05 Sep 2013 17:29:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1151</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Common alarm clocks ignore your sleep cycles, they wake you on schedule no matter your are currently in your deep sleep. Waking up<b> </b>from the deep sleep unpleasant, it makes you tired and it may negatively affect your productivity during the whole day.

Sleep as Android is different. It tracks your sleep to find the<strong> </strong>optimal moment for your wake up. Waking up in light sleep is natural, gentle and it may only be compared to the experience of waking up without any alarm clock.

<img alt="Sleep as Android - screenshot" src="https://lh6.ggpht.com/xnOCW7m9R8qvBHcfpDYOgVOlKHdjU5UhjPKXkaMIQxroCZLfsdEBV_pJpC6Z7Wz3IdBg=h900-rw" />]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1151</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-09-05 17:29:16</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2013-09-05 17:29:16</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>

	<item>
				<title>Symple - Symptom Tracker &amp; Health Diary</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/symple-symptom-tracker-health-diary/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 10 Sep 2013 17:02:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1246</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>
<h1>Symple - Symptom Tracker &amp; Health Diary</h1>
<h2>By Symple Health, LLC</h2>
</div>
<div><a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!lite">View More By This Developer</a></div>
Open iTunes to buy and download apps.
<div>
<div>
<h4>Description</h4>
SYMPLE An elegant symptom journal for your iPhone. Easy to use, and flexible enough to meet any set of symptoms, regardless of condition or disease.

Get started today and discover patterns in your symptoms.

- Track as many as 20 symptoms at a time
- Record medications, exercise &amp; other factors that influence your symptoms
- Keep daily notes and photos
- Easily share your history with your doctor
- Export data to your favorite spreadsheet app

______________________________________

THE X FACTOR

See how WHAT you do affects HOW you feel.

By tracking your symptoms &amp; the factors that influence those symptoms (like starting a new medication, walking for 30 minutes, or adopting a gluten-free diet), you can discover what helps and what hurts.

Does exercise affect your mood?
Is red wine the cause of your insomnia?
Does prednisone reduce your bowel pain?

Beautiful graphs merge factors &amp; symptoms into one, so you can see how they relate.

Simply swipe to scroll through current symptoms.

______________________________________

FIVE STARS "My shoulder pain kept coming and going, but I didn't know why. Tracking it with Symple helped me figure it out."

FIVE STARS "Remembering what happens between office visits is a breeze. And I love the Doctor's Report. Yay!"

FIVE STARS "Symple offers my patients a better way to report their symptoms and side effects, which lets us be more collaborative. Good work!"

______________________________________

BUILT WITH BOTH THE PATIENT AND CLINICIAN IN MIND.

Please keep sharing feature requests, questions &amp; advice.
We can't get better without you.

support@sympleapp.com

</div>
<div><a href="http://www.sympleapp.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Symple Health, LLC Web Site</a><a href="http://www.sympleapp.com/support.html" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Symple - Symptom Tracker &amp; Health Diary Support</a></div>
<div>
<h4>What's New in Version 1.7.3</h4>
We are preparing to deliver our most requested feature: the ability to track your symptoms more than once per day.

This first update is simply a reminder to always backup your data before updating as well as a few minor tweaks.

</div>
<div>
<div>

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>SleepBot - Sleep Cycle, Motion, and Sound Tracker</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/sleepbot-sleep-cycle-motion-and-sound-tracker/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 23 Sep 2013 18:46:08 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1687</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!liur">SleepBot</a> is a sleep cycle tracker that lets you record movements and sounds throughout the night.

Customize how you want to sleep and wake up gently each morning during your lightest sleep phase. Listen to soothing ambient soundtracks as you fall asleep.

SleepBot is the most complete sleep tracker, smart alarm, and ambient sound machine in the App Store:

Smart wake up: Gradual alarm based on movements and noise within 30 minutes before first alarm!  Multiple alarms capability: Only smart alarm that lets you set multiple alarms as alerts or precautions.

-Movement tracking: Adjustable sensitivity, easily compare with sound graphs

- Sound tracking: Detailed sound graphs let you play back noise with a tap

- 10 custom designed alarm soundtracks designed for Smart Wake-up

- Background mode: sleep tracking continues even in the background

- Long-term Trend graphs: length, sleep/wake times, pattern for sleep quality over time

- Statistics: Analyze any time range to see sleep debt, average sleep, etc.

- Ambient Noise: Soothing soundtracks to help you gently fall asleep

-Sleep Help: Find out how to fall asleep or stay awake from quick action lists

-Automatic Sync: backup and restore sleep data, and view it online!

-Export: Share sleep entries, graphs, and stats as images or csv

<a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!liur"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/069/Purple2/v4/21/46/6e/21466e37-b56a-cbc1-b51f-51fb13336fa4/mzl.iamwtcay.320x480-75.jpg" width="270" height="480" /></a>

<a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!liur"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/077/Purple/v4/c9/72/29/c97229e0-5cf5-8abc-2986-a83a4bd767f8/mzl.cdsyuzoo.320x480-75.jpg" width="270" height="480" /></a>

	<item>
				<title>FitBit One Wireless Activity and Sleep Tracker </title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/fitbit-one-wireless-activity-and-sleep-tracker/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 19:22:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1801</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>FitBit One</h1>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><em>Fitbit One</em> allows users to track steps, distance, calories burned, and stairs climbed. It also helps users learn how to sleep better, wake in the morning, and track overall sleep quality. <em>One</em> easily clips onto a pocket, belt, or bra.  It is rain, splash, and sweat-proof.  <em>One</em> automatically syncs information to PCs, Macs, iPhone 4S &amp; 5, iPad 3, Retina &amp; mini and the iPod touch and select smartphones.  Users can also view data by logging onto<em> Fitbit’s</em> web site. At the site or on the app, users can see badges earned, share and compete with friends, and log other activities and meals. <em>Fitbit One</em> is powered by a rechargeable battery.</p>
[gallery type="rectangular" ids="2140,2141,2142"]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Fitbit Aria Wi-Fi Smart Scale</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1802</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 21:58:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1802</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2><a href="http://shrsl.com/?~4bou" target="_blank"><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-2147" alt="FitbitAriaWiFi" src="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/FitbitAriaWiFi.png" width="411" height="221" /></a></h2>
<h2><a href="http://shrsl.com/?~4bou" target="_blank">Fitbit Aria Wi-Fi Smart Scale</a></h2>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><em>Fitbit Aria Wi-Fi Smart Scale</em> measures weight, body fat percentage, and body mass index (BMI). The scale automatically recognizes up to eight users by weight.  Data on the scale remains private unless users choose to share it with others.  <em>Fitbit</em> offers both an Android and iPhone app - allowing users to set goals, log food, and keep track of physical activity.  <em>Aria</em> automatically uploads data through Wi-Fi directly to the <em>Fitbit</em> dashboard.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[Fitbit Aria Wi-Fi Smart Scale measures weight, body fat percentage, and body mass index (BMI). ]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1802</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-09-28 21:58:06</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2013-09-28 21:58:06</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>

	<item>
				<title>Fitbit Zip</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/fitbit-zip/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 20:00:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1810</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;
<h1>Fitbit Zip</h1>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Fitbit  Zip  is a small quarter-sized device that allows users to track physical activity and/or sleep.  The Zip's silicone clip gives users the choice of wearing it on their pocket, belt, or bra.  It is rain, splash, and sweat-proof.  Zip automatically syncs information to PCs, Macs, iPhone 4S &amp; 5, iPad 3, Retina &amp; mini and the iPod touch and select smartphones.  Users can view data by logging onto Fitbit's web site. At the site or on the app, users can also track food/calorie intake, other exercises, and weight.</p>
[gallery type="rectangular" ids="2136,2132,2135,2138"]

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>MoodPanda - Mood Diary &amp; Tracker</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/moodpanda-mood-diary-tracker/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 20:53:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1819</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[MoodPanda.com is a mood tracking website and iphone app. Tracking is very simple: you rate your happiness on a 0-10 scale, and optionally add a brief twitter-like comment on what’s influencing your mood. <a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/moodpanda-mood-diary-mood/id447452124%3Fmt%3D8%26uo%3D4%26at%3D10l59V&amp;usd=2&amp;usg=ALhdy2_jkIGByc3Q96idyD1nSsK43WvePg">MoodPanda</a> is also a large community of friendly people, sharing their moods, celebrating each others’ happiness, and supporting each other when they’re down.

Once you start to track your daily mood it sets a seed in your mind and you can start to concisely think of things that will make you happier and avoiding thing’s that won’t.  We think this is the key to making the world happier, just the simple act of showing people what has made them, and others, happier in the past is a sure fire way to make them happier in the future.

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/47/77/87/477787d7-6e9c-4cc0-3237-66dec8ce64a4/screen320x480.jpeg" />

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/92/42/d7/9242d7e5-6137-89b7-9086-cdb7f3b19a4f/screen320x480.jpeg" />

	<item>
				<title>Neurosky Mindwave</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/neurosky/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 21:16:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1825</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Designed in Silicon Valley by NeuroSky, MindWave Mobile is an EEG headset that safely measures your brainwaves in real time as you interact with your computer or mobile device (iOS and Android).

The MindWave Mobile  measures and outputs the EEG power spectrums (alpha waves, beta waves, etc), NeuroSky eSense meters (attention and meditation) and eye blinks. The device consists of a headset, an ear-clip, and a sensor arm. The headset's reference and ground electrodes are on the ear clip and the EEG electrode is on the sensor arm, resting on the forehead above the eye (FP1 position). The headset transfers data via Bluetooth to wirelessly communicate with your computer (Mac and PC) and mobile devices (iOS and Android).

The MindWave Mobile headset transfers data via Bluetooth to wirelessly communicate with your computer and mobile devices (iOS and Android). You can also write your own programs to interact with MindWave Mobile by using the free development tools online.<a href="http://store.neurosky.com/collections/tools">
</a>

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1825</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-09-26 21:16:43</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2013-09-26 21:16:43</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>

	<item>
				<title>RunKeeper</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/runkeeper-gps-track-running-walking-cycling/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 21:38:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1832</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[GPS Track Running Walking Cycling

<a href="http://paltip.com/https:..quantimodo.com/!187ep">RunKeeper</a> is a mobile application available on iPhone and Android to track your runs: distance, duration, speed, and calories consumed.

The mobile application uses GPS to measure your distance. It also has several features to motivate you to run: 1) you can preset exercise intervals and distances; 2) it allows you to listen to music while running; 3) a voice informs you about the progress of your run; and 4) it stores a history of your runs. The mobile interface shows you a list of your runs, while the web site has Fitness Reports with visualizations of your runs.  Measure your performance over time.  Measure your progress against your goals and targets.   Integrate your activity data with more than 70 other apps and services including MyFitnessPal, Lose It, Fitbit, Withings, Garmin and many more, to get deeper insight into your overall health.

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple6/v4/fb/af/44/fbaf4493-4f83-8cab-4253-7929cb9f4f8d/screen568x568.jpeg" />

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a3.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple6/v4/7f/97/99/7f9799d1-e096-6d7c-84ea-d734e91710d5/screen568x568.jpeg" />]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Daytum</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/daytum/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 22:10:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1834</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Whether you would like to tally an afternoon or a year,<a    href='http://paltip.com/https:..quantimodo.com/!187ew' ;uo=4&amp;at=10l59V"> Daytum</a> can help you collect and communicate the most important statistics in your life. From an up-to-the-moment personal dashboard, to a tabulation of an event, a home for sports scores, or as a corporate tool.  Daytum has numerous options for displaying your data.  Group the items you track into multiple categories to create more detailed records and display possibilities.

Access m.daytum.com from your iPhone or android phone, or use the Twitter interface to add data to your page from anywhere.

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a4.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/055/Purple/39/53/60/mzl.gnaaluyp.320x480-75.jpg" />

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>Happiness - Mood Tracking Journal</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/happiness-mood-tracking-journal/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Sep 2013 22:26:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1840</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2></h2>
<h2>Happiness can be hard to find and easy to forget.</h2>
We are all prone to forgetting our past feelings and playing down the negative forces in our lives.

Use this app to keep an objective record of the things that make you happy or unhappy and you'll soon find out what really makes you tick.
<ul>
	<li>Rate and tag your happiness levels</li>
	<li>Record events that happened recently</li>
	<li>Explore the influences in your life</li>
	<li>Get reminded as often as you'd like</li>
	<li>Demo mode so you can show your friends without sharing sensitive personal information</li>
</ul>
<a href="http://a4.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/078/Purple2/v4/13/e8/91/13e89122-d7b0-7c67-c4d7-966286d9b99f/mzl.ygxcxfcn.320x480-75.jpg"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a4.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/078/Purple2/v4/13/e8/91/13e89122-d7b0-7c67-c4d7-966286d9b99f/mzl.ygxcxfcn.320x480-75.jpg" width="270" height="480" /></a>

<a href="http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/061/Purple2/v4/86/2d/d4/862dd4a1-2143-db90-f9e0-4a327be35d49/mzl.potovcww.320x480-75.jpg"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/061/Purple2/v4/86/2d/d4/862dd4a1-2143-db90-f9e0-4a327be35d49/mzl.potovcww.320x480-75.jpg" width="270" height="480" /></a>

<a href="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/107/Purple2/v4/c1/7f/50/c17f5050-bb8c-3a22-b4a7-f5bfddb27a64/mzl.ptjbfkpt.320x480-75.jpg"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 3" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/107/Purple2/v4/c1/7f/50/c17f5050-bb8c-3a22-b4a7-f5bfddb27a64/mzl.ptjbfkpt.320x480-75.jpg" width="270" height="480" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1840</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-09-26 22:26:37</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2013-09-26 22:26:37</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>happiness-mood-tracking-journal</wp:post_name>

	<item>
				<title>EEG Display For NeuroSky MindWave</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/eeg-display-for-neurosky-mindwave-mobile-a-quantified-self-research-tool/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 27 Sep 2013 16:04:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1862</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/imgres1.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2572" alt="EEG" src="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/imgres1.jpg" width="140" height="140" /></a>

The easiest way to look at your brain's electrical activity with NeuroSky MindWave Mobile headband. Includes raw EEG signal, brain activity score with audio biofeedback and brainwave bands.

&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>My Fitness Pal</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/my-fitness-pal/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:23:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1913</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h3><a href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/47532/1292">Myfitnesspal</a></h3>
<img alt="" src="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/i/71745/47532/1292" width="1" height="1" border="0" />

■ Fully syncs with the web, so you can log from your computer or your phone, whichever is more convenient. Plus your data is backed up online so you never lose it.
■ Diet with your friends - add friends and easily track and support each other's progress
■ 3,000,000+ food database of global items and cuisines.
■ Barcode scanner - scan the barcode of a food and easily find its match in our database.
■ Track all major nutrients: calories, fat, protein, carbs, sugar, fiber, cholesterol, and more
■ Frequently used foods automatically remembered for easy access
■ Save and reuse entire meals
■ Recipe calculator - Enter your own recipes and calculate their nutritional contents
■ Add multiple items at once

<a href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/47532/1292"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/15/43/4c/15434c06-8ba8-fc38-ed83-98cfb9e247fd/screen568x568.jpeg" width="320" height="568" /></a>

<a href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/47532/1292"><img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/62/a5/70/62a570b3-2ba6-5cf1-bf54-58378c5673e8/screen568x568.jpeg" width="320" height="568" /></a>
<a href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/47532/1292"><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/41nnclZgruL.png" width="512" height="512" /></a><a href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/47532/1292"><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/71iqtzNGsGL.png" width="800" height="1280" /></a><a href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/47532/1292"><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61F8V2z6TyL.png" width="800" height="1280" /></a>

	<item>
				<title>Lose It!</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/lose-it/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:37:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1920</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Lose It! helps you set a daily calorie budget, track your food and exercise, and stay motivated to make smarter choices and achieve your goal. We think it’s the best, most seamless weight loss system available.  Lose It! is based on the proven principles of calorie tracking and peer support for healthy, sustainable weight loss.  We seamlessly connect you to the people, devices, and food information you need to achieve your weight loss goals.  We customize a weight loss plan that fits your life. Set your goals and achieve them on your terms.

Tracking Features
-Comprehensive validated food and exercise database
-Easy to use calorie counter to stay within your daily budget
-Barcode scanner makes tracking a snap!
-Recipe builder
-Share foods with friends
-Meal &amp; Exercise Planning helps you stay on track!*

Lose It! helps you set goals for weight loss, exercise, macronutrient intake,* blood pressure,* sleep,* and more! You set the goals, we’ll help you with the plan to achieve them.

Goals available in Lose It!:
-Weight
-Body Fat*
-Hydration*
-Sleep*
-Steps*
-Exercise (Calories, Minutes)*
-NikeFuel*
-Nutrients (Carbohydrates, Fats, Protein, Fiber, Sodium)*
-Measurements (Neck, Hip, Waist, Bicep, Thigh, Chest)*
*requires premium upgrade
*<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 1" src="http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/81/9b/18/819b184d-54e8-0081-0663-9bfe633fe7f7/screen568x568.jpeg" />

<img alt="iPhone Screenshot 2" src="http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple/v4/40/20/ad/4020ad03-4ac5-4d61-5f4f-0777efd7afe3/screen568x568.jpeg" />]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>My Net Diary</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/my-net-diary/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:41:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1923</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<ul>
	<li>High-quality food database - over 490,000 foods, with built-in barcode scanner</li>
	<li>Tracks up to 45 nutrients</li>
	<li>Daily and weekly analysis, detailed feedback, helping make better food choices</li>
	<li>Tracks exercise, water, body measurements, BP, vitamins, and more</li>
	<li>Easiest food entry, searches as you typeFOOD TRACKING
✓ Very fast and easy to use – absolutely the fastest app available for food entry!
✓ Searches foods as you type – finds most foods after entering 3-4 letters
✓ Organizes and remembers your favorites and typical servings
✓ Enter your own custom foods
✓ Create recipes
✓ Detailed food labels and food score
✓ Optional food time trackingEXERCISE
✓ Over 500 activities and exercises available at your fingertips
✓ Calculates exercise calories based on MET - your weight
✓ Allows exercise calorie entry - great for body monitors and exercise machines
✓ Track time or distance for running/walking
✓ Enter your own custom exercisesPLANNING
✓ Set your target weight
✓ Plan for your target date or desired weight loss rate
✓ Calculates target calories, weight maintenance calories, BMI and BMR
✓ Calculates based on your age, height, weight, gender and activity level
✓ Includes weekly exercise planning
✓ Carb, fat, and protein budgets/targets, with energy percentagesEXTRA FEATURES
✓ Keep track of daily steps, blood pressure, hours of sleep and work
✓ Beautiful charts comparing plan, averages and meals, measurement charts
✓ Weight progress chart with target weight line
✓ Record and chart all body measurements
✓ New Calories Chart
✓ Food Scores - understand a food label at glance
✓ Before and After photos
✓ English and metric units

SUPPORTED THROUGH MYNETDIARY.COM
✓ State-of-the-art online website for food and exercise entry
✓ Online Community supported by a Registered Dietitian
✓ Family and private groups, sharing with your doctor, dietitian or coach
✓ Twitter integration - tweet what you eat and exercise<img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61aFlK5hvBL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61560jTVRgL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61-6vheXGnL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61dJWHZsTGL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61fTYe9GZLL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51YtWUBEKAL.png" /><img alt="" src="http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/61w5K7Y-iML.png" /></li>
</ul>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Fitbit Flex Wristband</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1963</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 05:11:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1963</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://shrsl.com/?~4bov" target="_blank"><img class="size-medium wp-image-2335 aligncenter" alt="Flex" src="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/Flex-300x148.jpg" width="300" height="148" /></a>

&nbsp;
<h2><a href="http://shrsl.com/?~4bov" target="_blank">Fitbit Flex Wristband</a></h2>
FitBit Flex tracks steps, distance, calories burned and active minutes.  It's LED lights show progress against personal goal.  Flex monitors sleep and wakes the user with a silent alarm.  Individuals can wear it all day and night, even in the shower.  Flex automatically syncs  data to the user's computer or smartphone.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>Basis Band</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/basis-band/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 04:59:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1944</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2><a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!7q6m" target="_blank">[gallery ids="2417,2418,2420,2419"]

</a></h2>
<h2> <a style="font-size: 1.5em;" href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!7q6m" target="_blank">Basis Band</a></h2>
Basis is a device that tracks heartbeats and more to paint the most useful picture of your health. Stay motivated by accumulating points and praise for your progress.  The Basis Band contains advanced sensors that continuously capture heart rate patterns, motion, perspiration and skin temperature throughout the day and night.  Users are able to check progress on activity goals, calories burned and steps taken anytime.  Basis automatically track  activity levels (duration, steps taken, calories burned), sleep stats (duration, times awoken and sleep quality) and even Resting Heart Rate.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[Basis is a device that tracks heartbeats and more to paint the most useful picture of your health. Stay motivated by accumulating points and praise for your progress.]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>NeuroSky MindWave</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/neuroskymindwave/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 05:00:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1945</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<script type="text/javascript">
  var zfBaseURL=(("https:"==document.location.protocol)
                 ? "https://neurosky.zferral.com/mjs/6/69723"
                 : "http://neurosky.zferral.com/mjs/6/69723");
  document.write(unescape("%3Cscript src=" + zfBaseURL
  + " type="text/javascript"%3E%3C/script%3E"));
</script>
<noscript><a href="http://neurosky.zferral.com/l/6/69723" title=""><img src="http://neurosky.zferral.com/m/6" alt="" title="" style="border: none"   /></a></noscript>
<h2><a href="http://zfer.us/nQ9gG" target="_blank">NeuroSky MindWave</a></h2>
"The MindWave Education turns your computer into a private tutor. The headset takes decades of medical EEG technology and puts it into a bundled software package for under $100. It safely measures brainwave signals and monitors the attention levels of students as they interact with math, memory and pattern recognition applications. Ten apps are included with experiences ranging from fun entertainment to serious education.]]></content:encoded>

<h2>Withings Smart Blood Pressure Monitor</h2>
Withings Smart Blood Pressure Monitor allows users to measure their blood pressure in one gesture and all data tracking is automatically done.    The application also provides recommended values based upon vital statistics, so users will know if their blood pressure is in the healthy range.]]></content:encoded>

				<title>Withings Wi-Fi Bodyscale</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/withingswifibodyscale/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 05:08:03 +0000</pubDate>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1><a href="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/withings.jpg"><img class="aligncenter size-medium wp-image-2399" alt="withings" src="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/withings-300x199.jpg" width="300" height="199" /></a></h1>
<h2>Withings Wi-Fi Bodyscale</h2>
Withings Wifi Bodyscale is a digital wireless body fat monitor and scale. Withings uses a wifi connection to directly transmit body fat and weight data to the user's online account or iPhone. Users can share the data on Facebook and Twitter or give to their healthcare provider. The scale is powered by four AAA batteries. Up to 8 users are supported.]]></content:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>BodyMedia FIT Armband</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/bodymedia/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 05:09:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1961</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-size: 13px;">The BodyMedia System provides users with  highly accurate information on activity, calories, and sleep pattern. The system consists of the BodyMedia armband monitor, an online activity manager, and an optional display watch, and iPhone and Android apps. The armband automatically tracks the calories burned and quality of sleep. The information tracked is synchronized with the Activity Manager where users can explore physical activity and sleep quality. Users can also record food consumption, which along with physical activity data can help individuals lose weight.</span>
<p dir="ltr">If you want to accurately monitor what's going on inside your body, you need a system that is in touch with you day and night. That's why BodyMedia FIT is worn directly on your arm. Its patented sensors detect skin temperature, heat flux and motion, so it knows what you're doing, when you're doing it and even the intensity of your effort. BodyMedia FIT is the only system of its kind that is an FDA-registered medical device.</p>
<p dir="ltr"><a href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/46528/1292" target="_blank"><img alt="Bodymedia" src="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/Bodymedia-300x300.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></a></p>

<h2 dir="ltr">Sleep Monitoring</h2>
The BodyMedia FIT system gives you a clear understanding of the quality and efficiency of your sleep.
<h2>The Science</h2>
The BodyMedia FIT Armband has multiple sensors. Those innovative sensors take 5 different "views" of your life:
<table cellpadding="8">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" nowrap="nowrap"><b>Motion</b></td>
<td valign="top">The Armband contains an accelerometer, a device that measures motion. (Your car air bag has an accelerometer in it that lets it know when you've been in an accident.) We use it to measure HOW you move from multiple axis and perspectives, allowing us to better understand your activity.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" nowrap="nowrap"><b>Steps</b></td>
<td valign="top">We count your steps, using the accelerometer to measure the distinct patterns created by walking and/or running.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" nowrap="nowrap"><b>Galvanic Skin Response</b></td>
<td valign="top">When you sweat, your skin becomes more electrically conductive. This measurement helps us see how active you are.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" nowrap="nowrap"><b>Skin Temperature</b></td>
<td valign="top">There's an electronic thermometer inside your armband that helps us know how hot you are.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" nowrap="nowrap"><b>Heat Flux</b></td>
<td valign="top">When you move, your muscles produce heat. We measure the heat that's flowing from your body into the environment.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2>Once we've gotten these "readings" we can determine what kind of exercise you're getting, and how difficult it is for you. That's important since your body burns calories differently than anyone else's.</h2>
<img alt="Clinically Proven to Accurately Measure the Amount of Physical Activity and Calories" src="http://www.bodymedia.com/images/iScienceSensors.gif" width="539" height="259" /><br clear="all" />Our clinically proven algorithms crunch your numbers  pairing up sensor data with calorie information and presenting it to you via the BodyMedia FIT Activity Manager &amp; so you know how far you are toward reaching your goals!

BodyMedia FIT is Clinically Proven to be Accurate

The BodyMedia FIT System has been Clinically Proven to Accurately Measure the Amount of Physical Activity and Calories.

A recent independent study tested our Armband system in real-life situations. Participants engaged in "free living" activities, including brisk walking, running, bicycling, sedentary activities, home activities, home repair, occupational activities, strength training, and ball games. The study compared the armband to a $40,000 "portable oxygen analyzer", the gold standard for measuring calories. Results showed:
<ul>
	<li>Total Calories for free living activities: mean error &lt;10%.</li>
	<li>Total Minutes of exercise: mean error &lt;5%.</li>
</ul>
<h2><a style="font-size: 1.17em;" href="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/c/71745/76509/1292">Buy Now</a></h2>
<img alt="" src="http://BodyMedia.ojrq.net/i/71745/76509/1292" width="1" height="1" border="0" />]]></content:encoded>

				<title>Zephyr HxM BT Wireless Heart Rate Sensor</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/portfolio/zephyr-hxm/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Sep 2013 05:10:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[quantimodo]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?post_type=portfolio&#038;p=1962</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1><a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!2mg20" target="_blank"><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-2440" alt="ZephyrHxM" src="https://quantimo.do/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/ZephyrHxM.png" width="270" height="270" /></a></h1>
<h2>Zephyr HxM</h2>
<p style="text-align: justify;">Zephyr HxM monitors heart rate, speed, and distance. The device snaps onto a machine washable, adjustable, elastic chest strap. Users are able to pair the device with their favorite app (including Endomondo, Strava, SportsTracker, Runtastic, ...) to track workout intensity, speed, and distance.</p>
<a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!2mg20" target="_blank">Zephyr HxM BT - Android</a>
<a href="http://paltip.com/quantimodo/!2mg22" target="_blank">Zephyr HxM Smart - iPod, iPhone, or iPad</a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>The Cost of Mental Illness</title>
		<link>http://utopia.quantimodo.com/cost-of-mental-illness/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 15 Oct 2013 23:42:08 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[m@quantimodo.com]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://quantimodo.com/?p=1983</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<address> Why Help Us Eradicate Mental Illness?</address>Mental illness is psychological prison which currently incarcerates millions of people around the world. It is an invisible and ignored epidemic. About half of the people you know will develop a mental illness at some point during their lifetime. Over 50 million Americans are currently forced to endure these lives characterized primarily by quiet desperation, which is often a fate worse than death.

Mental health is THE greatest unmet need of our time. About half of the people you know will develop a mental illness at some point during their lifetime. Over 50 million Americans currently suffer from some form of mental illness.
<h3>Direct Medical Cost = $150 Billion per Year</h3>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Direct medical costs related to mental illness (i.e. therapy, drugs, hospitalization, etc.) total about $150 billion, annually.</p>

<h3>Cost of Incarcerating the Mentally Ill = $35 Billion per Year</h3>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Over <a href="http://www.bjs.gov/content/pub/press/mhppjipr.cfm">half</a> of the U.S. prison population are mentally ill. Instead of treating the underlying biological and environmental <a href="http://www.livestrong.com/article/90313-causes-mental-disorders/">causes</a> of these disorders, we are criminalizing and <a href="http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/02/04/mental-illness-prisons-jails-inmates_n_2610062.html">incarcerating</a> the mentally ill. The government currently spends over <a href="http://www.businessinsider.com/americas-prison-system-is-out-of-control-2012-4?op=1">$70 billion</a> per year on corrections.</p>

<h3>Cost of Social Services for the Mentally Ill = $150 Billion per Year</h3>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">The mentally ill are at higher risk of poverty, increasing their need for other public safety-net services like food stamps and subsidized housing. Their use of those services costs taxpayers another $150 billion a year.</p>

<h3>Lost Productivity Costs of Untreated Mental Health Disorders = $79 Billion per Year</h3>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Indirect costs of untreated mental health disorders results in a $79 billion annual loss to businesses due to loss in productivity and absenteeism.</p>

<h3>Cost of Unscientific Self-Medication = $468 Billion per Year</h3>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Due to the unavailability of appropriate care, many mental illness sufferers attempt to reduce their emotional pain by using harmful drugs. Depression is often self-medicated with alcohol, tobacco, cannabis, methamphetamine, heroin, cocaine, and even spray paint. While this may provide immediate relief of some symptoms such as anxiety, all of these drugs tend to evoke and/or exacerbate some symptoms in the longer term.  Government spending related to smoking and the abuse of alcohol and illegal drugs reached $468 billion in 2005.  Most abuse-related spending went toward direct health care costs for lung disease, cirrhosis and overdoses or for law enforcement expenses. Beyond resulting in poor health and crime, addictions and substance abuse are major underlying factors in other costly social problems like homelessness, domestic violence and child abuse.</p>

<h3>The Human Toll = 800,000 People Commit Suicide Each Year</h3>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">More people die by suicide than by homicide.  Suicide is often committed out of despair caused by depression, bipolar disorder, or schizophrenia. Approximately 8.4 million adults in the U.S. had serious thoughts of suicide in the past year, 2.2 million planned a suicide attempt, while one million actually attempted suicide. Many people who attempt suicide permanently damage their brains.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[Mental illness is psychological prison which currently incarcerates millions of people around the world. Over 50 million Americans are currently forced to endure these lives characterized primarily by quiet desperation, which is often a fate worse than death.]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1983</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-10-15 23:42:08</wp:post_date>
